Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a plant that is healthy with plenty of water and light.
The student can draw a plant that looks unhealthy without enough water.
The student can draw a plant that looks unhealthy without enough light.
The student can show and label what happens to plants when they do not get water.
The student can show and label what happens to plants when they do not get light.
The student can compare healthy and unhealthy plants to identify patterns.
The student can illustrate and label where plants can and cannot grow, based on light and water availability.
